title: In the Name of Your Death - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Josei   Mature   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Beautiful Female Lead   Early Romance   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdoms   Knights   Nobles   Royalty   Tragic Past   Wealthy Characters   Wizards
author: White Fence   흰울타리
description:
Yvonne is a blessed wizard. She wasn’t herself as the core of the dragon was planted in her heart. She was becoming like a dragon: cold and distant. So she left. She left her lover by her own choice, and when he passed away, she realized that life without him was just as painful. She couldn’t bear to part with him, so she killed herself without regret.  Then, she awoke to a world that she didn’t know. The world had forgotten the past. Dragons were but a myth. But as she was starting to live, a prophecy came before her.

Don’t love him. You’ll destroy him as you did in the past.>
